title: The historie of Ariodanto and Ieneura, daughter to the King of Scottes, in English verse, by Peter Beuerley
author: Beverley, Peter, of Staple Inn.
publisher: By Thomas East, for Fraunces Coldocke,
notes: A paraphrase of a story in Book 5 of: Ariosto, Lodovico. Orlando Furioso.
Running title reads: Ariodanto and Ieneura.
Identified as STC 1985 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
